document_data.name: Hassan
document_data.mainbody: '''Hassan''' was a powerful [[efreeti]] who patrolled the halls of the [[Royal Harim of Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities: He was sworn to slay any male—aside from the [[eunuch]] [[mamluk]]s also on guard—found within the Royal Harim.
document_data.Relationships:
Hassan began his service to the [[Grand Caliph]] when he was presented to [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir]] as a gift from [[Adnan al-Raqi]].

Over the years, Hassan became rather domesticated by the Grand Caliph's wives. They often encouraged him to take long naps during which male visitors could sneak into the harem.
